          <title>
            <string language="en">The Earth spinning around its axis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Masse, die um seine Mittellinie spinnt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La terre tournant autour de son axe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A terra que gira em torno de sua linha central</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La terra che fila intorno al relativo asse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γη που περιστρέφει γύρω από τον άξονά του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La tierra que hace girar alrededor de su eje</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the Earth spins around its own axis and makes one full turn every 24 hours. This may be used for a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">axis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">days</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">north</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">south</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Time</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Masse um seine 
eigene Mittellinie spinnt und bildet eine volle Umdrehung alle 24 
Stunden. Dieses kann für eine beschriftende Übung verwendet 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que la terre tourne 
autour de son propre axe et fait à un plein tour toutes les 24 
heures. Ceci peut être utilisé pour un exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que a terra gira em 
torno de sua própria linha central e faz a uma volta cheia cada 24 
horas. Isto pode ser usado para um exercício etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che la terra fila 
intorno al relativo proprio asse e rende ad una girata completa ogni 
24 ore. Ciò può essere usata per un'esercitazione 
identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι γήινες περιστροφές 
γύρω από τον άξονά της και κάνουν μια πλήρη στροφή κάθε 24 
ώρες. Αυτό μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για μια άσκηση 
μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que la tierra hace girar
alrededor de su propio eje y hace una vuelta completa cada 24 horas. 
Esto se puede utilizar para un ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
